profile.title: Runaq Profile-nin
profile.noPrivateKey: Kay llapanpi mana ñuqaqpa private key kanchu exportanaypaq.
profile.importSuccess: Private key kay aparaqpaq imayman churasqaña.
profile.importFailed: Key importay manam atirqachu (tapukuy simi pantay utaq ch’iqi willakuy).
profile.keysRotated: Musuq iskay key rurakusqa, public keyqa apachisqaña.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Private key kay llapanmanta mana lluqsiy. Huk aparaqman churaypaq, tapukuywan waqaychasqa kikinpaq kopya eksportay.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Qam Free nisqapi kashanki — kay uraypi Inti/Killa nisqa akllanakunata apay. Aswan theme kananpaq upgrade ruway.
profile.backupDesc: Tapukuywan waqaychasqa keykuna qillqay, huk aparaqpi kutiy achuraypaq sinkronizay.
profile.followHint: Paykunaq ‘Followers’ utaq ‘Public’ nisqawan qillqaptin, paypa ‘Following’ qillqaykipi rikhurinqa.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Haykuy willakuyta llamadakunata verified telefonoykita utaq emailniyta apachiy. Lluqsiy llamadakuna/willakuykuna Chatforia yupaykita rikuchinqa.

chat.selectPrompt: Qillqay utaq chat wasita akllay qallarinapaq

auth.headline: Segurasqa, llaqtakunaqpaq willakuy kuska tikrasqa
auth.description: Tukuy-ñawpaq ch’askay (E2E), IA tikray, chinkakuq willakuykuna, hinaqa rimay/uqariy.

feature.privacy: Privacidad ñawpaq. Qampaq datos, qampa kamachiy.

auth.desktopTip: Kompuradurapi kachkanki? Telefonoykawan escaneay appta aywarinaypaq.
auth.tip: Imaymana aparakupi Chatforiata llamk’achkanki — appta urmaykuspa aswan allinmi.
auth.scanHint: Appta urmanaypaq utaq browserpi kichanaypaq k’illpata escaneay.

press.title: Prensa
press.boilerplateText: Chatforiaqa segurasqa willakuy apaq, tikray pacha-pachapi E2E ch’askasqawan, llapan runaqpaq achka simipi aswan allin rimanaypaq.

careers.title: Llamk’aykuna
careers.intro: Ñuqayku iskay lliw ayllu kashan, segurasqa, llaqta simikunawan willakuy apaq. Ch’askay, atipay, alli UX llank’ayta munanki chayqa qamwan rimanchik.
careers.openRoles: Kichasqa llamk’ay: Ingeniería (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Producto, Soporte.

about.title: Chatforia ñawpaq
about.description: Chatforiaqa segurasqa, achka simiwan willakuy apaqmi, tukuy-ñawpaq ch’askasqa, pacha-pachapi tikrasqa, rimay/uqariywan. Rimayta aswan allin, seguridadwan, simikunawan t’akikuyta qhawanaypaq.
about.howDescription: Willakuykuna aparaqpi ch’askasqa, chaymantaña lluqsinqa. Tikray, backup, sinkronización nisqakunaqa server hinam mana aswan rikhurinanpaq rurasqa.

advertise.title: Chatforiawan willay (anuncios)
advertise.description: Allin qhawanap kamachiywan rimanakuy ruranakupi rikhuriy. Banner, sponsor, house promosmi. Premium rikhukunaqa mana anuncios rikuq.

adsense.withPubId: Kunan Google AdSense-wan qhawanakuyta apanchik. Google Adspi kay publisher ID {{pubId}} nisqata hapispa, kay kayninakunapi managed placement mañakuy. Direct sponsorqa kashan — formulario hap’iy.
adsense.noPubId: Kunan Google AdSense-wan qhawanakuyta apanchik. Hinallataq direct sponsorqa kashan — kay uraypi formulario hap’iy.

advertise.noPlacements: Manam placements configurados kanchu. ads/placements.js-pi yapay.

why.highSession: Chat UIpim aswan kutichisqa, tiempopi tiyarichiq
why.deals: Direct deals utaq programático AdSense/Google Adswan

upgrade.title: Wakichiy
upgrade.subtitle: Qampaq allin plan akllay: Pluswan anuncios mana qhawarichiy, utaq Premiumwan llapa kallpachakuy.

gettingStarted.title: Qallariy
gettingStarted.subtitle: Musuqmi Chatforiapi? Kay utqay guíaqa yanapanki minutosman allin llamk’achinaypaq.

alert.text: Kay guíaqa wiñanampaq kachkan musuq ruraqkunawan. Imapas falta, kayman willay

section2.title: 2) Rimanakuy qallarichiy
section2.item1: DM utaq Grupo ruray huk willakuy apachiy.
section2.item3: Profile → Privacidadpi chinkakuq willakuy & ñawiriyta yachay.

section3.title: 3) Aswan hina
section3.item1Part2: pichapi (Plus = anuncios mana, Premium = llapa kallpachakuy).
section3.item2Part1: Huk aparakuna t’inkiy hinallataq backup encryptasqa churay

account.q: Imayna cuenta kamariyta utaq kutiyta ruwani?
account.a: Appta urmay utaq webta llamk’achiy, “Cuenta kamariy” nisqata hap’iy, email/telefonoykita q’illqay. Kutiyta munaspa “Tapukuy simita qunqurirqani” nisqata hap’iy.

privacy.a: Arí. Willakuykuna llamadakuna E2E ch’askasqalla kachkan. Qam hinaspa chaskiqkuna sapaqmi ñawinchakunku.

translate.a: Ajustes → Rikch’ay & Simi-pi “Auto-translate”-ta activar. Dispositivopi atispa llamk’achin, manataqpis API seguruwan, pisiy metadatawan.

contact.a: support@chatforia.com-man qillqaway. Pantallazo hinallataq app versión nisqayki churay.

intro.body: This Privacy Policy explains how Chatforia (“we”, “us”) collects, uses, and shares information when you use our apps and services. We design Chatforia to minimize the data we can access.

infoWeCollect.title: Information we collect
infoWeCollect.account: Account info (e.g., email/phone) to create and secure your account.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Encrypted content (messages/calls) is end-to-end encrypted; we can’t read it.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostic/usage like crash logs, device type, or coarse analytics to improve performance.

howWeUse.title: How we use information
howWeUse.provide: Provide and secure the service (auth, spam/abuse detection).

sharing.title: Sharing
sharing.body: We don’t sell personal data. We may share limited data with processors (e.g., push notifications, analytics) under strict contracts.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.body: Depending on your region (e.g., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), you may request access, correction, deletion, or opt-out of certain processing. Contact: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Data retention & security
retention.body: We retain only what’s needed to operate the service and apply industry-standard security. E2E content can’t be decrypted by us.

children.title: Children
children.body: Chatforia isn’t directed to children under 13 (or as required by your local law).

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We’ll post updates here and revise the “Last updated” date.

intro.body: By using Chatforia you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, don’t use the service.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Provide accurate info and keep credentials secure.
accounts.itemResponsibility: You’re responsible for activity on your account.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable use
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: No illegal, abusive, or infringing content; no spam or automated abuse.

yourContent.title: Your content
yourContent.body: You retain rights to your content. You grant us necessary rights to operate the service (e.g., routing, storage, translation).

disclaimer.title: Disclaimers & liability
disclaimer.body: Service is provided “as is” without warranties. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Chatforia isn’t liable for indirect or consequential damages.

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We may update these terms; continued use after changes means acceptance.

doNotSell.title: Ama apamuy ñoqaykuq personal informasyonta
doNotSell.body: Chatforiaqa mana personal informasyonta qallpachkan. California runakunaqa CPRA nisqapa normasninpi tapusqaykuta apachinqa.

cookies.title: Cookie Ajustes
cookies.body: Chatforiaqa aslla cookiekunata llamk’achin (ej., sesión, seguridad). Mana qhawaq-musuq anuncios cookiekunata llamk’achinchikchu. Browserniykipi cookie ajustesta kamachiy.

phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Mana yupay churakusqachu. Área code nisqawan akllay, chaymanta qillqayta qallariy.

startChatModal.title: Rimanakuy qallarichiy
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Suti, usuario, telefono utaq email qillqay…
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Usuario suti utaq telefonota qillqay, chaymanta Maskhay.

sounds.freeNotice: Freepi kachkanki — premium tonos rikhurinqa icha mana kichasqa. Upgrade ruway llapan kichanapaq.

aiSettings.title: IA Ajustes
aiSettings.controlIntro: Tikray, llapa kutichiy, ForiaBot auto-kutichiyta kamachiy.
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Qhipa haykuq willakuykuna (limpiasqa) IA-man apachiy utqay kutichiykuna mañaypaq.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: IA kutichiypi mana allin simita tapukuy
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: On kaptinqa, IA kutichiq tapukusqa simikunawan kutichinqa

accessibilitySettings.title: Atipay & Willay
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Chatforiata sutinchay mana uyarikuypa hina allinta llamk’achinaypaq.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Chikninmanta qallarinqa. Hatunyachiyta munaspa, kaypi churay.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Willakuy & llamadapaq qhawaq willakuy
Bannerkuna, titullata ch’illpachiy, ama chinkachiy.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Musuq willakuy kaptin tikray (atisqa kaptin)
Notificaciónwan aparaq tikray.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Haykuq llamadapi pantallata llipllipachiy
Huk t’iti brillante llamadapi.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Rimay willakuyta auto-qillqachiy
Haykuq audioq willakuykuna qillqawan apachiy.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Serverpi ciphertextlla waqaychani. IA/Tikray hinallataq moderación qhawayqa mana iman.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Alias, suti, usuario suti, utaq telefonowan maskhay
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Invitay linki qhaway, chaymanta utqay rimanakuy qallarichiy.
peoplePage.syncTip: Tip: Willakuykikuna web chaymanta movilpi sinkronizakusqa kachkan.

randomChat.title: Suyaylla rimanakuy
randomChat.description: Huk musuq runawan utqay tupanakuy. Ñuqaykuqa qamta tupachisun, huk temporallu chat wasita kichasun.
